title: Manikyam Emerald Diamond Vaarai Jhumka: A Touch of Timeless Telugu Heritage
materials: and brilliant cut Diamonds. Showcases intricate filigree work with a rich Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Features a square-shaped stud with delicate filigree work, studded with an emerald at the center and rubies at the four corners, outlined with sparkling diamonds. The intricate gold work reflects traditional Telugu jewelry craftsmanship, with a small pearl dangle adding a subtle touch of elegance. Inspired by temple jewelry designs.
colors: Pearl (white). This combination reflects the auspicious colours traditionally used in South Indian jewelry.
occasions: and other special celebrations. Its unique design ensures it looks equally stunning with traditional and modern attire.
description: A true reflection of South Indian heritage, this Vaarai Jhumka is handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail. The high-quality gemstones and pure gold guarantee lasting beauty and value. Owning this piece means owning a piece of Telugu culture and craftsmanship.
